diff_act: 3.display the controller's identity in the lead cab

regen.absent_element: indication of controller's identity when the controller initiates the call and is automatically added to the multi-driver call in non-lead cabs
regen.new_specification: When the controller initiates a call and is automatically added to the multi-driver call, the system shall display the controller's identity in all cabs.

regen.absent_element: indication of controller's identity when controller initiates call and is added to multi-driver call in non-lead cabs
regen.new_specification: The system shall display the controller's identity in all cabs when the controller is automatically added to the multi-driver call.

regen.absent_element: indication of controller's identity when the controller initiates the call and is automatically added to the multi-driver call in non-lead cabs
regen.new_specification: The system shall display the controller's identity in all cabs when the controller is automatically added to the multi-driver call.

label: Functional identity of the automatically added controller shall be displayed in the leading cab.
absence: display the identity of the automatically added controller
